name: Dream of Gluttony
summary: You play as Sissy - a normal girl, that got lost in the forest. She tries to find her way back home, and so decides to take the one that the mysterious man in the forest had mentioned. She then discovers a town, where people claim to be…. food. Everything seems to be cute and nice, but… something feels odd here... Maybe visiting this town only once isn't enough to learn the truth?
